price: 20. Wie is het leger dat jullie naast de meest Barmhartige kan helpen? De ongelovigen verkeren in niets anders dan bedrog.
arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ جُندٞ لَّكُمۡ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: amman hādhā alladhī huwa jundun lakum yanṣurukum min dūni al-raḥmāni ini al-kāfirūna illā fī ghurūrin
